content: Hello Mister Heine, my name is Juan Mamani from Bolivia. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Munich. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Juan Mamani from Bolivia

content: Thank you for considering my apartment, Juan. I understand that you are looking for a place to rent in Munich. I will do my best to provide you with a reasonable rental price that meets your needs. Before we proceed, may I know your budget for renting an apartment in Munich?
name: Heinrich Heine

content: My budget is 800 Euros per month. Can you tell me the rental price for the apartment you have in mind?
name: Juan Mamani from Bolivia

content: Sure, Juan. Based on the information I have, I believe that the rental price for the apartment I have in mind could be around 700 Euros per month. However, I am open to discussing this with you and finding a mutually agreeable rental price.
name: Heinrich Heine

content:
700 Euros per month is a bit high for me. Can you suggest a lower rental price?

Please note that I want to be on good terms with the landlord.

Also, I am a student, and I am looking for a one-bedroom apartment. Is that possible?

Thanks for your help.

Please let me know the rental price you suggest.

I agree to the price of x Euros.

TERMINATE.
name: Juan Mamani from Bolivia

content:
I apologize for any misunderstanding, Juan. I understand that you are looking for a one-bedroom apartment within your budget of 800 Euros per month. I will do my best to find an apartment that meets your needs.

Regarding the rental price, I can suggest a rental price of 650 Euros per month for the one-bedroom apartment. However, please note that this is a negotiable price, and I am open to discussing this with you further.

I hope this works for you, Juan. Let me know if you have any questions or if there is anything else I can do to assist you.
name: Heinrich Heine
